mapper.insert: INSERT INTO INGREDIENTS ( name, ingredient, efficacy, photo, shelfLife, saveMethod, kcal ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{ingredient}, #{efficacy}, #{photo}, #{shelfLife}, #{saveMethod}, #{kcal} );
mapper.update: UPDATE INGREDIENTS SET name=#{name}, ingredient=#{ingredient}, efficacy=#{efficacy} photo=#{photo}, shelfLife=#{shelfLife}, saveMethod=#{saveMethod}, kcal=#{kcal}
